name: [Arrow of Aberration Slaying](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Aberration_Slaying)
effect: Deals weapon damage, damage is doubled against [Aberrations](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Aberration).

name: [Arrow of Acid](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Acid)
effect: Deals Weapon Damage + 2d4[Acid](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acid)[DRS](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Damage_rider_as_source) ([Dexterity Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate).Creates a permanent  [Acid](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acid_(surface)) surface  AoE: 2 m / 7 ft (Radius).

name: [Arrow of Arcane Interference](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Arcane_Interference)
effect: Deals weapon damage. Breaks the targets  [Concentration](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Concentration) and inflicts  [Silenced](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Silenced_(Condition)).

name: [Arrow of Beast Slaying](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Beast_Slaying)
effect: Deals weapon damage, damage is doubled against [Beasts](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Beast).

name: [Arrow of Construct Slaying](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Construct_Slaying)
effect: Deals weapon damage, damage is doubled against [Constructs](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Construct).

name: [Arrow of Darkness](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Darkness)
effect: Deals weapon damage. Creates Area:  [Darkness](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Darkness_(cloud)) that inflicts  [Blinded](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Blinded_(Condition)) in  AoE: 3 m / 10 ft (Radius) for 3 turns.

name: [Arrow of Dragon Slaying](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Dragon_Slaying)
effect: Deals weapon damage, damage is doubled against [Dragons](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dragon).

name: [Arrow of Elemental Slaying](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Elemental_Slaying)
effect: Deals weapon damage, damage is doubled against [Elementals](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Elemental).

name: [Arrow of Fiend Slaying](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Fiend_Slaying)
effect: Deals weapon damage, damage is doubled against [Fiends](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Fiend).

name: [Arrow of Fire](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Fire)
effect: Deals weapon damage + 2d4[Fire](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Fire)[DRS](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Damage_rider_as_source) ([Dexterity Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate).Creates a  [Fire](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Fire_(surface)) surface for 2 turns  AoE: 2 m / 7 ft (Radius).

name: [Arrow of Humanoid Slaying](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Humanoid_Slaying)
effect: Deals weapon damage, damage is doubled against [Humanoids](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Humanoid).

name: [Arrow of Ice](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Ice)
effect: Deals weapon damage + 2d4[Cold](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cold)[DRS](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Damage_rider_as_source) ([Dexterity Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate).Creates an  [Ice](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ice_(surface)) for 2 turns  AoE: 2 m / 7 ft (Radius).

name: [Arrow of Ilmater](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Ilmater)
effect: Deals Weapon Damage + 1d4[Necrotic](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Necrotic). Target cannot regain [Hit Points](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Hit_Points) for 1 turn.

name: [Arrow of Lightning](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Lightning)
effect: Deals weapon damage + 2d4[Lightning](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Lightning)[DRS](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Damage_rider_as_source) ([Dexterity Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) in  AoE: 2 m / 7 ft (Radius).

name: [Arrow of Many Targets](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Many_Targets)
effect: Deals weapon damage and an additional half of that damage to three other targets in range.

name: [Arrow of Monstrosity Slaying](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Monstrosity_Slaying)
effect: Deals weapon damage, damage is doubled against [Monstrosities](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Monstrosity).

name: [Arrow of Roaring Thunder](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Roaring_Thunder)
effect: Deals Weapon Damage. Knocks back  Range: 5 m / 17 ft([Strength Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) that caught in the blast  AoE: 2 m / 7 ft (Radius).

name: [Arrow of Salving](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Salving)
effect: Cures a target of [Poisoned](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Poisoned_(status_group)), [Paralysed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/SG_Paralyzed) and  [Blinded](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Blinded_(Condition)) conditions.

name: [Arrow of Transposition](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Transposition)
effect: Teleports the shooter wherever this arrow is fired.

name: [Arrow of Undead Slaying](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Undead_Slaying)
effect: Deals weapon damage, damage is doubled against [Undead](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Undead).

name: [Smokepowder Arrow](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Smokepowder_Arrow)
effect: Deals 4d6[Fire](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Fire) + 4d6[Force](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Force) and knocks back targets  Range: 3 m / 10 ft that are caught in the blast  AoE: 5 m / 17 ft (Radius).

name: [Arrow of Piercing](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arrow_of_Piercing)
type: Deals weapon damage + half of that to creatures directly behind the target.

name: [Barbed Arrow](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Barbed_Arrow)
type: Deals Weapon Damage and  ruptures the target.
